product_name: REI All Season Tech Compatible Gloves - Girls'
long_description: The REI All Season Tech Compatible gloves feature conductive material on the thumbs and index fingers, letting a girl use her touch-screen phone or tablet while keeping her hands warm. Polyester hard-face fleece with a touch of spandex provides a snug fit, water repellency, wind resistance and breathability. Conductive material at the tips of the thumbs and index fingers allows you to send text messages and operate your touch screen without having to take your gloves off. Silicone pattern on the palms improves grip.
